title: Petition to Drop Course After Deadline
description: A student needs to drop a course after the official drop/add deadline due to a medical emergency.

tasks.description: Identify the student and the course they wish to drop.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the student's enrollment in the course.

tasks.description: Explain the petition process for a late withdrawal, including the need for supporting documentation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly outlines the required steps and forms.

tasks.description: Provide the student with the official petition form and instructions on where to submit it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent emails the correct form and submission link to the student.
